languages.text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.
languages.original_text: Союзная цель немедленно получает дополнительный ход с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и количеством {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, равным {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}. Это тяжелое испытание для организма, поэтому цель получает <u>5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} при совершении любого действия во время {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g}, а также в конце каждого своего хода до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The target ally immediately gains an extra turn with twice the number of their normal MP and <u>(Psyker's psy rating)</u> AP, but begins to bleed heavily suffering <u>(5% of their maximum wounds)</u> damage at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during the extra turn will also trigger the bleed damage.

The target ally immediately gains an extra turn with twice the number of their normal MP and <u>psyker's psy rating</u> AP, but begins to bleed heavily, suffering <u>5% of their maximum wounds</u> damage at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger the bleed damage.

The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

The target ally immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their organism is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> damage at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} will also trigger this damage.

The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

languages.text: 目标盟友立即获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，获得两倍{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。然而，目标的神经系统会承受极其可怕的压力，每个回合结束时都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的5%</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。目标在这个额外回合内每行动一次，都会触发一次伤害。
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: 目标盟友立即获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，获得两倍{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。然而，目标的神经系统会承受极其可怕的压力，每个回合结束时都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的5%</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。目标在这个额外回合内每行动一次，都会触发一次伤害。

目标盟友立即获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，获得两倍{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。然而，目标会流血不止，每个回合结束时都会受到流血伤害，等同于<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的5%</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。目标在这个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}内每行动一次，都会触发一次流血伤害。

目标盟友立即获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，获得两倍{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。然而，目标会流血不止，每个回合结束时都会受到流血{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的5%</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。目标在这个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内每行动一次，都会触发一次流血伤害。

languages.text: El aliado objetivo gana de inmediato un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con el doble de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} normales y {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, pero empieza a sangrar profusamente por el estrés sufrido por su cuerpo, por lo que sufre <u>5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}</u> como {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al final de cada turno hasta el final del combate. Cada acción que realice el objetivo durante este turno extra también activa el daño por sangrado.
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: El aliado objetivo gana de inmediato un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g} con el doble de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} normales y {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, pero empieza a sangrar profusamente por el estrés sufrido por su cuerpo, por lo que sufre <u>5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}</u> como {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al final de cada turno hasta el final del combate. Cada acción que realice el objetivo durante este turno adicional también activa el daño por sangrado.

El aliado objetivo gana de inmediato un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adicional con el doble de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} normales y {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, pero empieza a sangrar profusamente, por lo que sufre <u>5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas</u> como daño al final de cada turno hasta el final del combate. Cada acción que realice el objetivo durante este {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g} también activa el daño por sangrado.

languages.text: ターゲットとなった仲間は通常{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}の2倍と{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費してただちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を得る。ただし、重い出血状態となり、ターゲットは<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の5%</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を戦闘終了まで毎ターン受ける。この追加ターンの間、ターゲットの行動にすべて出血ダメージが発生する。
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットとなった仲間は通常{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}の2倍と{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費してただちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を得る。ただし、重い出血状態となり、ターゲットは<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の5%</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を戦闘終了まで毎ターン受ける。この追加ターンの間、ターゲットの行動にすべて出血ダメージが発生する。

ターゲットとなった仲間は通常{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}の2倍と{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費してただちに追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g} を得る。ただし、重い出血状態となり、ターゲットは最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の<u>5%</u>のダメージを戦闘終了まで毎ターン受ける。この{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}の間、ターゲットの行動にすべて出血ダメージが発生する。

ターゲットとなった仲間は通常{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}の2倍と{uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費してただちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g} を得る。ただし、重い出血状態となり、ターゲットは<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}体力{/g}の5%</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を戦闘終了まで毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}受ける。この追加ターンの間、ターゲットの行動にすべて出血ダメージが発生する。

languages.text: Союзная цель немедленно получает дополнительный ход с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и количеством {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, равным {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}. Это тяжелое испытание для организма, поэтому цель получает <u>5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} при совершении любого действия во время {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g}, а также в конце каждого своего хода до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: Союзная цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и количеством {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, равным <u>{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера</u>. Это тяжелое испытание для организма, поэтому цель получает <u>5% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u> урона при совершении любого действия во время {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g}, а также в конце каждого своего хода до конца боя.

Союзная цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и количеством {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, равным <u>{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера</u>. Это тяжелое испытание для организма, поэтому цель получает <u>5% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u> урона при совершении любого действия во время {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g}, а также в конце каждого своего хода до конца боя.

Союзная цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} с удвоенным запасом {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и количеством {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, равным {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346}. Это тяжелое испытание для организма, поэтому цель получает <u>5% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}</u> урона при совершении любого действия во время {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительного хода{/g}, а также в конце каждого своего хода до конца боя.

languages.text: Der anvisierte Verbündete erhält augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit der doppelten Anzahl seiner normalen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, doch sein Organismus ist einer enormen Belastung ausgesetzt, wodurch er bis zum Ende des Kampfes am Ende jedes Zugs {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}</u> erleidet. Jede Aktion des Ziels während dieses Zusatzzugs löst diesen Schaden ebenfalls aus.
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: Der Zielverbündete erlangt augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit der doppelten Anzahl seiner normalen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, doch sein Organismus ist einer enormen Belastung ausgesetzt, wodurch er bis zum Ende des Kampfes am Ende jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von <u>5 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}</u> erleidet. Jede Aktion des Ziels während dieses Zusatzzugs löst diesen Schaden ebenfalls aus.

Der Zielverbündete erlangt augenblicklich eine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzrunde{/g} mit der doppelten Anzahl seiner normalen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, beginnt aber bis zum Ende des Kampfes schwer zu bluten, wodurch er <u>5 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}</u> Schaden erleidet. Jede Aktions des Ziels während dieser {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzrunde{/g} löst außerdem Blutungsschaden aus.

languages.text: L'allié ciblé bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec le double de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} normaux et {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, mais son organisme est soumis à une pression intense, ce qui lui fait subir <u>5 % de sa réserve {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum de blessures{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au terme de chaque tour jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque action qu'entreprend la cible pendant ce tour supplémentaire déclenche également des dégâts de saignement.
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.

traits.locale_text: L'allié ciblé bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire avec le double de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} normaux et <u>{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy du psyker{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, mais il se met à saigner abondamment, ce qui lui fait subir <u>5 % de sa réserve maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}</u> points de dégâts au terme de chaque tour jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque action qu'entreprend la cible pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} déclenche également les dégâts de saignement.

L'allié ciblé bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire avec le double de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} normaux et {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, mais il se met à saigner abondamment, ce qui lui fait subir <u>5 % de sa réserve maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}</u> points de dégâts au terme de chaque tour jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque action qu'entreprend la cible pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} déclenche également les dégâts de saignement.

languages.text: Hedef dost birim, anında normalinin iki katı {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye ve {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır ancak bedeni, aşırı strese maruz kaldığından dolayı her tur sonunda <u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'i kadar</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Hedefin bu ek tur esnasında yaptığı her eylem de bu hasarı tetikler.
languages.original_text: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their body is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each turn until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.
